item.title: How clips from Hollywood movies could liven up news footage
item.author: Robert Cleaver,
item.description: As news breaks at 7am about a man fighting the Russian airforce in the Indian Ocean, the BBC use live footage. They cut to Tom Cruise celebrating victory after shooting down all the enemies, despite his sadness at the loss of his co-pilot. It sounds bizarre, but in China it has actually happened. …

item.title: Don’t be a James Blunt...
item.author: Robert Cleaver,
item.description: Anyone can claim to have saved the world. I stopped the toast from going that little bit too brown this morning. I don’t know it yet, but this could have saved the world. James Blunt has claimed that he stopped World War III from happening. Single handedly, on his own, and with no other input. …
